item.title: 【WEB MASTER】Yello - Touch Yello: The Virtual Concert [WebMaster 1080p / PCM 24-bit 48 kHz]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Jazz
Style: Lounge, House, Future Jazz, Downtempo
Year: 2009
Source: Vimeo, WebMaster (1080p mov with PCM)

"Touch Yello" is the 12th studio album by Swiss electronic band Yello, released on October 2, 2009.
"Touch Yello: The Virtual Concert" was released to celebrate the 30 years anniversary of the duo. Touch Yello evokes moods, pictures, and movie scenes. For the creation of this virtual concert, they’re working with Kevin Blanc, a Swiss moving image designer, and art director. The premiere of Touch Yello was accompanied by live performances by the famous German jazz musician Till Brönner and singer Heidi Happy.

Yello is, without doubt, one of the most influential bands in the wide and open context of Electronic music. From their earliest incarnation as slick Swiss guys with a strange back story making very odd Disco, their music has permeated everything from comedy films to contemporary art installations.

Tracklist
01. Intro
02. Till Tomorrow
03. The Expert
04. You Better Hide
05. Out Of Dawn
06. Bostich (Reflected)
07. Kiss In Blue
08. Vertical Vision
09. Tiger Dust
10. Tangier Blue
11. Oh Yeah 2009
12. The Race 2008
13. Credits

Release Info
This WebMaster is downloaded from Vimeo (1080p H.264 MOV / PCM 24-bit 48 kHz).
I've muxed it with the chapters from the DVD release and named the chapters.
